Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Enacts the "CR clean water and sewer authority act"
Summary: Enacts the "CR clean water and sewer authority act" in relation to creating the CR clean water and sewer authority.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Title 11-E §§1349-a - 1349-z, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to creating the CR clean water and sewer authority
